file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0 info: title: Bulk API version: 2.0.0 description: | The API for performing bulk uploads

File Preparation

This API requires a file to be submitted with the appropriate schema. The details of that file's schema can be found at File schema tags: - name: UploadAllParticipants servers: - url: '/bulk/{stateAbbr}/v2' variables: stateAbbr: default: none description: Lowercase two-letter postal code abbreviation paths: '/upload_all_participants/{filename}': put: operationId: upload_all_participants summary: Upload a CSV file of bulk participant data description: Upload a CSV file of bulk participant data. Each state is allowed a maximum of 60 requests per minute. tags: - Bulk Upload parameters: - name: filename in: path description: Name of file being uploaded required: true schema: type: string - in: header name: Content-Length schema: type: integer required: true description: Size in bytes of your file to be uploaded. A curl request will add this header by default when including a data or file parameter. example: 6413 requestBody: content: text/plain: schema: type: string format: binary responses: '201': description: File uploaded content: application/json: schema: title: Upload response type: object properties: data: type: object nullable: true description: The response payload. Will contain a data property with upload details. required: - upload_id properties: upload_id: type: string description: A unique upload_id for the successful upload. examples: Default: description: An upload of a single CSV file of all the participants value: data: upload_id: '0x8DA2EA86C4C2089' '401': description: Access denied '411': description: Content-Length not provided '/upload/{filename}': put: operationId: upload (deprecated) summary: Deprecated. This endpoint has been renamed to `upload_all_participants` and will be removed in a future version. Upload a CSV file of bulk participant data. Each state is allowed a maximum of 60 requests per minute. tags: - Bulk Upload parameters: - name: filename in: path description: Name of file being uploaded required: true schema: type: string - in: header name: Content-Length schema: type: integer required: true description: Size in bytes of your file to be uploaded. A curl request will add this header by default when including a data or file parameter. example: 6413 requestBody: content: text/plain: schema: type: string format: binary responses: '201': description: File uploaded content: application/json: schema: title: Upload response type: object properties: data: type: object nullable: true description: The response payload. Will contain a data property with upload details. required: - upload_id properties: upload_id: type: string description: A unique upload_id for the successful upload. examples: Default: description: An upload of a single CSV file of all the participants value: data: upload_id: '0x8DA2EA86C4C2089' '401': description: Access denied '411': description: Content-Length not provided '/uploads/{uploadIdentifier}': get: operationId: Get Upload Details tags: - Bulk Upload summary: Get Upload Details description: Get details regarding a bulk upload. Each state is allowed a maximum of 120 requests per minute. parameters: - in: header name: From schema: type: string description: 'As in the HTTP/1.1 RFC, used for logging purposes as a means for identifying the source of invalid or unwanted requests. The interpretation of this field is that the request is being performed on behalf of the state government-affiliated person whose email address (or username) is specified here. It is not used for authentication or authorization.' required: true - in: path name: upload_identifier schema: type: string description: The Upload ID retrieved from a bulk upload required: true responses: '200': description: Success content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: data: type: object description: The response payload representing upload data. required: - upload_identifier - created_at - status properties: upload_identifier: type: string description: The unique identifier for the upload example: '0x8DA63770FEF1551' created_at: type: string format: date description: The timestamp when the requested upload was performed. example: '2022-07-11T19:54:27.903811Z' participants_uploaded: type: integer description: The number or participants uploaded into the NAC example: 50 error_message: type: string description: Error details as to why an upload failed example: Exception of type 'CsvHelper.FieldValidationException' was thrown. completed_at: type: string format: date description: The timestamp when the requested upload was completed. example: '2022-07-11T19:54:28.303961Z' status: type: string description: |- COMPLETE - when successful FAILED - The upload was unsuccessful. The NAC will continue to match against records of active participants from your previous successful upload UPLOADING - The file is uploading to the NAC, or the file has uploaded but is still being validated example: COMPLETE examples: Successul upload 200: description: 200 Response to successful upload value: data: upload_identifier: '0x8DA63770FEF1551' created_at: '2022-07-11T19:54:27.903811Z' participants_uploaded: '40' completed_at: '2022-07-11T19:54:28.303961Z' status: COMPLETE Failed Upload '200': description: 200 response on an upload that failed value: data: upload_identifier: '0x8DA63770FEF1551' created_at: '2022-07-11T19:54:27.903811Z' error_message: Exception of type 'CsvHelper.FieldValidationException' was thrown. completed_at: '2022-07-11T19:54:28.303961Z' status: FAILED Not Found: description: 404 Not found exception value: errors: status: '404' title: NotFoundException detail: not found '400': description: Bad Request content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: statusCode: type: string description: Status of the upload example: '400' title: type: string description: The title of the error example: Bad Request Exception detail: type: string description: The detailed description of the error example: Request was not valid '401': description: Access denied content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: statusCode: type: string description: Status of the upload example: '401' message: type: string description: The message explaining the reason for access denied example: Access denied due to invalid subscription key. Make sure to provide a valid key for an active subscription '404': description: Not Found content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: data: type: object description: The response payload representing upload data. properties: statusCode: type: string description: Status of the upload example: '404' title: type: string description: The title of the error example: NotFoundException detail: type: string description: The detailed description of the error example: not found security: - ApiKeyAuth: [] components: securitySchemes: ApiKeyAuth: type: apiKey in: header name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

Error: parse: parse spec: parse path items: path "/uploads/{uploadIdentifier}": get: operation "Get Upload Details": at docs/openapi/generated/bulk-api/openapi.yaml:131:7: parse path "/uploads/{uploadIdentifier}": path parameter not specified: "uploadIdentifier"
